ygData.subject: Clarification
ygData.msgSnippet: What I mean by an invalid email address is a non-existant one.  It takes 1 year of NOT checking most free email accounts for an account to be deleted.  Trust

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

What I mean by an invalid email address is a non-existant one.  It 
takes 1 year of NOT checking most free email accounts for an account 
to be deleted.  Trust me, I have tried to delete an old hotmail 
account of mine.

If I get no response from an email address without a message about the 
email address not existing, it stays.  I will not start this 
verification process for a while so don't start worrying.

I will start my verification process with those who do not receive 
email from this group, but only check by visiting the website.

This is about 1)checking email addresses and 2)spreading news about a 
potential Gladiator tournament.

BTW, last month was a record setter for number of messages posted to 
this group.
